title: TotalCode Studio 3.5.0 build 19743 RePack-VR [deepstatus]
description:
[center]

[b]TotalCode Studio 3.5.0 build 19743 RePack-VR [deepstatus][/b]



[img]http://s27.postimg.org/iegztepkj/Main_Concept_Total_Code_Studio_3_5_0_3.jpg[/img]



        Professional desktop encoding for digital 
        distribution and over the top services


         [b]Information[/b]

        Whether your content is consumed on tablets, smartphones,
        TVs or set-top boxes or delivered through different channels,
        such as broadcast, cable, satellite, the Internet or IPTV
        TotalCode Studio has you covered. TotalCode Studio can
        help post-production studios, small content preparation houses,
        broadcasters, and non-linear editors succeed with efficient 
        workflows and stunning video quality.

    
         A plug-in based application that incorporates MainConcept's
         codecs into a single desktop application, TotalCode Studio
         is practical, efficient and cost effective option for almost
         any professional market segment Ã¢â‚¬â€œ from content producers and
         consumer electronics manufacturers to broadcast and 
         OTT content preparation.
         Due to its many ready-to-use presets and multi-purpose advanced
         encoder settings, TotalCode Studio enables you to convert your
         video and audio into numerous formats including some of the latest
         standards such as HEVC, Ultra HD 4K, MPEG-DASH,
         as well as popular mainstream distribution formats like HLS.


       [b]TotalCode Studio 3.5 also supports the following new features:[/b]

       TotalCode Studio allows import of HEVC 10-bit files
        in MPEG-2 TS and MP4, or as ES.
       Update to the latest HEVC Encoder and Decoder from HEVC SDK 5.0,
        including High Tier and BT.2020 support.
       Improved handling of input streams that contain variable frame rates,
        including A/V synchronization optimizations.
       TotalCode Studio can now import and create 8K RAW streams.
       Advanced Settings Dialog now available for DivX Plus format.

        Many powerful features, such as watch folder automation,
        batch list encoding, audio and video filters color correction,
        timecode insertion, and audio normalization make TotalCode Studio
        an ideal tool for production environments requiring professional
        quality and performance.


          [b]Features[/b]

       [b]Support for Popular Delivery Formats[/b]
       Export multiplexed files using a wide range of popular 
       formats including
       H.264/AVC, QuickTime (for Apple iPad and iPhone), Adobe Flash,
       3GP (H.263, H.264, MPEG-4), HTML5, DVB, and DivXÃ‚Â®.

       [b]Apple HLS and DASH-265 / DASH-264 Compliant File Creation[/b]
       Create presets and encode MPEG-DASH compliant 
       DASH-265 and DASH-265 files. 
       Moreover, you can create Apple HLS compliant content.

       [b]HEVC (8-bit / 10-bit) and DivX HEVC[/b]
       Encode H.265/HEVC and DivX HEVC in various resolutions up to
       UltraHD (4K) and in real-time up to 1080p30. 
       Now with ready-to-use HEVC Main 10 profiles, 
       and MPEG TS output support.

       [b]Watch Folder Automation[/b]
       Configure folders with predefined encoding parameters 
       and leave TotalCode to automatically process incoming media whenever
       it is added.

       [b]Built-in Video and Audio Processing[/b]
       Adjust source files with color correction, timecode insertion,
       audio normalization, video scaling, and frame
       and sample rate conversion.

       [b]Scalable Codec Support[/b]
       Add more advanced video and audio codecs
       (e.g., JPEG2000, and DTSÃ‚Â®) as needed, through seamless upgrades that
       utilize the same familiar TotalCode Studio encoding interface.

       [b]Batch List Encoding[/b]
       Execute multiple tasks efficiently by setting up a batch process
       for files that use specified encoding presets and output formats.

       [b]Built-in Video and Audio Processing[/b]
       Adjust source files with color correction, timecode insertion,
       logo burn-in, image flipping, image cropping, audio normalization,
       video scaling, and frame and sample rate conversion.

       [b]TotalCode Preset Exchange[/b]
       Create custom presets in TotalCode Studio and exchange presets
       between TotalCode Studio and TotalCode Enterprise.

       [b]Full 64-bit Support[/b]
       TotalCode Studio is now a native 64-bit application,
       with improved 4K HEVC  transcoding performance, and support
       for 10-bit ProRes source files, including ProRes 4:2:2 and 4:4:4.



        [b] Supported Operating Systems[/b]

        Windows 7 Ultimate and Professional SP1 x64, 
        Windows 8.1 (64-bit) Windows 10

         Minimum System Memory - 8 G



        [b][INSTALLATION][/b]



         - Unrar with you favorite archiver, such as WinRar

         - Install 

         - Ok, It's Activated!
